.. rst-class:: sphx-glr-example-title

.. _sphx_glr_tutorials_example.py:


This example shows how to plot a simple line chart using matplotlib with SocialED data.

Section 1: Data Preparation
---------------------------

We start by creating a simple dataset.

.. GENERATED FROM PYTHON SOURCE LINES 9-22



.. image-sg:: /tutorials/images/sphx_glr_example_001.png
   :alt: Simple Line Chart
   :srcset: /tutorials/images/sphx_glr_example_001.png
   :class: sphx-glr-single-img





.. code-block:: Python


    import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

    # 数据准备
    x = [1, 2, 3, 4]
    y = [10, 15, 13, 17]

    # 绘制折线图
    plt.plot(x, y)
    plt.title("Simple Line Chart")
    plt.xlabel("X-axis")
    plt.ylabel("Y-axis")
    plt.show()  # 这个命令会生成并显示图表
